description: Number of labeled trees with n nodes and 3 leaves.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 4..200
Index entries for sequences related to trees
formula: (n!/3!)*stirling2(n-2, n-3). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Jan 28 2004a(n) = n! * (n-3)*(n-2)/12. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jul 25 2014
maple: a:=n->sum((n-j)*n!/3!, j=3..n): seq(a(n), n=4..19); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 29 2007
author: _Christian G. Bower_, May 11 2000
